title: Help me, cannot play game after 27 minute mark :(
body: Since the last patch, I have noticed that once the game timer hits 27 minute mark, my game freezes/crashes without **bugsplat**. It will freeze forever until I restart my computer, but the same thing happens once I go in game to reconnect again. Essentially, my team ends up losing because I am unable to play after the 27 minute mark due to some unknown error. I have already attempted to use hextech repair tool to repatch and nothing has changed. Please help ! :(

replies.body:
It’s their shitty anti-cheat. It triggers for no reason apparently, been having it for days and I’ve quit playing until they fix it. I’ve lost enough LPs because of that.

Let’s see if it’s on Riot’s priority list or (probably) not.
It's impossible since according to the boards games ends in 20 minuts maximum.

Check out this link with the same topic. I hope this can be resolved ASAP

Please do, I put a evidence based information post on this thread that can tell you exactly what is going on. Take a quick look and it might help a bit.

The anti cheat triggers this. Its done it for me a number of times and I think I'd actually rather waste my time on another game where ill actually be able to play past 27 minutes. Its getting pretty ridiculous. I'm so glad im not the only one having this exact issue.
